member.name: T:RstLinkRevitClient.RsLinkExport
member.summary: Export all structural elements to the RstLink intermediate file. Currently, only columns and framing is implemented - skeleton code is in place for others.

member.name: M:RstLinkRevitClient.RsLinkExport.GetStructuralElements(Autodesk.Revit.DB.Document)
member.summary:
Retrieve all structural elements in the given document.
In addition to the explicit filtering demonstrated here, the StructuralInstanceUsageFilter might also retrieve exactly the desired elements with no further ado.
The StructuralMaterialTypeFilter might also be useful.

member.name: M:RstLinkRevitClient.RsLinkExport.CreateRSMember(Autodesk.Revit.DB.FamilyInstance,Autodesk.Revit.DB.Structure.AnalyticalModel)
member.summary: Export helper to create an RSMember instance from a family instance representing a structural member.

member.name: M:RstLinkRevitClient.RsLinkExport.ExportMembers(Autodesk.Revit.DB.Document,System.String)
member.summary: Export all structural members in the iven document to an external file and return the user selected filename.

member.name: T:RstLinkRevitClient.RsLinkImport
member.summary: Import incremental changes from the RstLink intermediate XML file

member.name: M:RstLinkRevitClient.RsLinkImport.GetFamilySymbol(Autodesk.Revit.DB.Document,Autodesk.Revit.DB.BuiltInCategory,System.String)
member.summary: Helper to get specified type for a given category. Return a family symbol for a given category name and type. (in theory, we can have non-unique solution, i.e. the same type name for more than one family from this category!)

member.name: M:RstLinkRevitClient.RsLinkImport.ImportMembers(System.String,Autodesk.Revit.DB.Document,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Import all structural members from a given external file into the document.
